caption: The Rosary offers a steady path of devotion through familiar prayers and sacred mysteries.
image_prompt: A stylized illustration of hands holding a well-worn rosary beads, with soft golden light illuminating the fingers. In the background, subtle, ethereal scenes of the Nativity, the Presentation in the Temple, and the Child Jesus among teachers are depicted in a gentle, dreamlike style reminiscent of Studio Ghibli. The composition is peaceful and reverent, with a focus on the tactile presence of the beads and the warm, devotional atmosphere, all rendered with anatomical accuracy and soft, flowing colors.
